subject: Re: [junit] testing Exception subclasses
msgSnippet: I want to test that the stuff that they re printing (ie to System.err, the PrintStream, or the PrintWriter) is correct. Thanks, Noel sorry for being obvious,
messageBody:
I want to test that the stuff that they're printing (ie to System.err, the
PrintStream, or the PrintWriter) is correct.

Thanks,
Noel

sorry for being obvious, but what do you want to observe that these methods do?

----- Original Message -----
From: "Noel L Yap" <yap_noel@yahoo.com>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 16, 2001 12:05 AM
Subject: [junit] testing Exception subclasses


> Please excuse my lack of Java knowledge. Does anyone know how I can test
> overloaded printStackTrace() methods of an Exception subclass?
